医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
全球研究探讨肉类消费与 2 型糖尿病风险之间的联系研究人员评估了食用未加工红肉、加工肉类和家禽与 2 型糖尿病之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Global-study-explores-the-connection- Between-meat-conspiration-and-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Global-study-explores-the-connection- Between-meat-conspiration-and-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2101af5-4f3d-4225-9d73-8a780b47d526 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 06:08:00 -0400 Global study explores the connection between meat consumption and type 2 diabetes risk
研究揭示性激素如何调节免疫系统功能研究结果表明，跨性别男性的睾酮治疗会改变免疫系统反应，这对疾病易感性和治疗产生影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-reveals-how-sex-hormones-regulate-immune-system-functions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-reveals-how-sex-hormones-regulate-immune-system-functions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f71cfbe-768a-4e5a-a6da-46519721a5f5 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 05:57:00 -0400 Study reveals how sex hormones regulate immune system functions
保持心理弹性可以降低全因死亡的风险该研究强调了心理弹性对死亡率的保护作用，表明其对于延长老龄化人口寿命的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Being-psychologically-resilient-can-reduce-the-risk-of-all-cause-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Being-psychologically-resilient-can-reduce-the-risk-of-all-cause-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60a79afa-70f6-42ce-8e7a-cad5d78b4681 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 05:29:00 -0400 Being psychologically resilient can reduce the risk of all-cause mortality
即使没有症状，抑郁症也会在大脑中留下一致的印记抑郁症中持续的显着性网络增长凸显了神经生物学变化，为情绪状态转变和治疗反应提供了潜在的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Depression-has-a-concient-mark-in-the-brain-even-when-symptoms-are-absent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Depression-has-a-concient-mark-in-the-brain-even-when-symptoms-are-absent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3a18a0d-0de9-4f45-a80e-12f564144618 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 05:04:00 -0400 Depression has a consistent mark in the brain even when symptoms are absent
夜间使用手机会恶化儿童的睡眠和心理健康，尤其是网络欺凌的受害者夜间使用手机对睡眠和心理健康有显着影响，网络欺凌加剧了儿童和青少年的心理困扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Phone-use-at-night-worsens-sleep-and-mental-health-in-kids-special-cyberbullying-victims.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Phone-use-at-night-worsens-sleep-and-mental-health-in-kids-尤其-cyberbullying-victims.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=724bad2d-f997-4d07-af4b-2b19524a3ed2 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 04:49:00 -0400 Phone use at night worsens sleep and mental health in kids, especially cyberbullying victims
Health Services Laboratories 通过与 Automata 合作加快 NHS 病理学服务的周转时间截至 2023 年夏季，以创新为主导的病理学和诊断服务提供商 Health Services Laboratories 与生命科学自动化公司 Automata Technologies 合作，以加快病理学和诊断服务的周转时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Health-Services-Laboratories-unlocks-faster-turnaround-times-for-NHS-pathology-services-by-collaborating-with-Automata.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Health-Services-Laboratories-unlocks-faster-turnaround-times-for-NHS-pathology-services-by-collaborating-with-Automata.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6bc577f-9ea7-43e4-b7d0-37d187e477d5 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 03:16:00 -0400 Health Services Laboratories unlocks faster turnaround times for NHS pathology services by collaborating with Automata
Automata Technologies 任命健康和生命科学行业高级高管顾问委员会Automata Technologies 是一家为生命科学实验室自动化提供支持的领先自动化公司，该公司已任命了首个顾问委员会，该委员会由全球医疗保健和生命科学行业的高级管理人员组成。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Automata-Technologies-appoints-advisory-board-of-senior-health-and-life-sciences-industry-executives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Automata-Technologies-appoints-advisory-board-of-senior-health-and-life-sciences-industry-executives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5996b4e0-d6af-4cb4-9cd4-a191563ce5cb Fri, 06 Sep 2024 03:14:00 -0400 Automata Technologies appoints advisory board of senior health and life sciences industry executives
英国首个针对癌症患者的机器人基因组测试设施启动皇家马斯登 NHS 基金会信托基金与 Automata Technologies（一家为生命科学实验室自动化提供支持的领先自动化公司）合作后，英国首次使用机器人技术来支持癌症患者的基因组测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/UKe28099s-first-robotic-genomic-testing-facility-for-cancer-病人-launches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/UKe28099s-first-robotic-genomic-testing-facility-for-cancer-病人-launches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7937bb8-f8b1-407d-8842-bd4239f2c393 Fri, 06 Sep 2024 03:13:00 -0400 UK’s first robotic genomic testing facility for cancer patients launches
产品获奖者：医药/健康类别Automata 很高兴地宣布 LINQ 荣获产品类别的 iF 设计奖：医药/健康 (1.22)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Winner-in-the-product-Medicinehealth-category.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Winner-in-the-product-Medicinehealth-category.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01f210b5-355d-454e-89c0-64d896b4135b Fri, 06 Sep 2024 03:03:00 -0400 Winner in the product: Medicine/health category
研究发现光污染与阿尔茨海默病之间存在相关性在全球某些地方，灯光永远不会熄灭。路灯、道路照明和照明标志可以阻止犯罪、使道路更安全并改善景观美化。然而，不间断的光照会带来生态、行为和健康方面的后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-finds-correlation- Between-light-pollution-and-Alzheimers-Disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240906/Study-finds-correlation- Between-light-pollution-and-Alzheimers-Disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76339236-465d-4188-99b9-52c846f40c1b Fri, 06 Sep 2024 02:18:00 -0400 Study finds correlation between light pollution and Alzheimer's Disease
